name: The World Record Egg Dating Simulator
name_original: The World Record Egg Dating Simulator
description:
Hi guys! So there's been this egg on Instagram that some of you guys might have seen and I decided to make a parody dating simulator for it because it's been blowing up so much that I couldn't resist. I had a lot of fun with this so hopefully you guys will enjoy! CAN WE MAKE THIS DATING SIMULATOR THE MOST VIEWED EGG DATING SIMULATOR OF ALL TIME???

INSTRUCTIONS:  You've stumbled upon the world of Social Media, you get 30 Days to build up love for the egg and get to 100%! You'll have to talk to them, answer their questions, and build up love! ;)

'Back To Map' takes you to the map where you can see all the possible locations where the egg will appear. The egg will be in specific locations at certain times and you need to find the egg by checking the different locations periodically!

FEATURES: 2 Different Endings! (for now) Many secrets to find ;)

Comment with your best scores, and I'll keep track of best scores with a record board here! Also comment with any bugs/glitches that I may not have caught! RECORD: [COULD BE YOU]
